nodes.text: Jedi Beast Master was a title reserved for Jedi Masters with a proficiency in controlling the minds of beasts. Additionally, Beast Masters worked to improve upon the nature of beasts, sometimes using alchemy or science to give rise to new creations. One of the most renowned Beast Masters was Kanzhei Opli who was credited with creating the only two tuk'ata nobilis from the DNA of the fearsome tuk'ata species.
